Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitUserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitUserService
public interface FlipFitUserInterface
Author: JEDI-Group D - Flipkart Development This interface defines the operations related to user management. This includes adding users, user login, password validation, password confirmation, and registration of gym owners and customers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addUser(FlipFitUser user)
    Adds a new user to the system.
    void
    confirmPassword(FlipFitUser user, String newPassword, String confirmPassword)
    Confirms the new password by checking if it matches the confirmation password, and updates the user's password if they match.

    login(String username, String password)
    Authenticates a user with the given username and password.

    Registers a new customer in the system.
    boolean

    Registers a new gym owner in the system.

    Validates the user's old password against the stored password.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(FlipFitUser user)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing user details.

    • login

      FlipFitUser login(String username, String password) throws InvalidLogin
      Authenticates a user with the given username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user trying to log in.
      password - The password provided by the user.
      Returns:
      The authenticated user object.
      Throws:
      InvalidLogin - If authentication fails.

    • validatePassword

      boolean validatePassword(FlipFitUser user, String oldPassword)
      Validates the user's old password against the stored password.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being validated.
      oldPassword - The old password provided for validation.
      Returns:
      True if the old password is correct; false otherwise.

    • confirmPassword

      void confirmPassword(FlipFitUser user, String newPassword, String confirmPassword)
      Confirms the new password by checking if it matches the confirmation password, and updates the user's password if they match.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being changed.
      newPassword - The new password to set.
      confirmPassword - The confirmation password to validate.

    • registerGymOwner

      boolean registerGymOwner(FlipFitGymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner in the system.
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - The gym owner object containing the owner's details.
      Returns:
      True if registration is successful; false otherwise.

    • registerCustomer

      boolean registerCustomer(FlipFitCustomer customer)
      Registers a new customer in the system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object containing the customer's details.
      Returns:
      True if registration is successful; false otherwise.
